subtasks.name: Review AI Regulation
subtasks.description: Thoroughly review the RAISE act to understand compliance requirements.
subtasks.notes: Essential for understanding compliance landscape.

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Plan
subtasks.description: Create a detailed compliance plan outlining necessary steps to meet the RAISE act requirements.
subtasks.notes: Requires collaboration with the legal team.

subtasks.name: Implement Training Programs
subtasks.description: Set up training programs for employees on AI safety and compliance.
subtasks.notes: Training must align with compliance requirements.

subtasks.name: Monitor Compliance
subtasks.description: Establish a monitoring system to ensure ongoing compliance with the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Monitoring tools may require specialized software.

subtasks.name: Conduct Regular Audits
subtasks.description: Perform regular audits to ensure adherence to compliance standards.
subtasks.notes: Audits must be thorough to avoid violations.

key_risks: Non-compliance with the RAISE act could lead to legal penalties.
Insufficient training may result in employee errors regarding AI usage.

subtasks.name: Review Regulation Text
subtasks.description: Analyze the RAISE act to understand its implications on existing AI practices.
subtasks.notes: Involves collaboration with legal team to ensure compliance.

subtasks.name: Develop Compliance Framework
subtasks.description: Create a framework to ensure adherence to the transparency requirements and obligations outlined in the act.
subtasks.notes: May require additional insights from external consultants.

subtasks.name: Employee Training Program
subtasks.description: Design and implement a training program for employees on AI safety and compliance.
subtasks.notes: Collaboration with HR and legal teams is essential.

subtasks.name: Audit and Reporting Procedures
subtasks.description: Establish procedures for auditing AI practices and reporting compliance to regulatory bodies.
subtasks.notes: Requires legal validation of reporting formats.

subtasks.name: Monitor Regulatory Changes
subtasks.description: Continuously monitor for updates or changes to the RAISE act and other relevant regulations.
subtasks.notes: Stay connected with legal team for timely updates.

key_risks: Non-compliance with new regulations could lead to penalties.
Insufficient employee training may result in misuse of AI technologies.

subtasks.description: Analyze the RAISE act to identify compliance requirements related to AI usage in real estate.
subtasks.notes: Legal team may need to clarify ambiguous terms.

subtasks.name: Develop AI Usage Policies
subtasks.description: Create internal policies for the training and use of AI models in accordance with the RAISE act.
subtasks.notes: Policies must be aligned with legal interpretations.

subtasks.name: Employee Training Program
subtasks.description: Design and implement a training program for employees on AI safety and compliance.
subtasks.notes: Training effectiveness should be regularly evaluated.

subtasks.name: Establish Reporting Mechanisms
subtasks.description: Set up systems for reporting compliance with AI usage and safety protocols.
subtasks.notes: Ensure that reporting is user-friendly.

subtasks.name: Audit and Compliance Checks
subtasks.description: Conduct audits to ensure adherence to AI policies and identify potential violations.
subtasks.notes: External legal team may be needed for audits.

key_risks: Potential misinterpretation of regulatory requirements leading to non-compliance.
Insufficient training may result in employees not adhering to AI safety protocols.
